comment: The class union of the intersection of two classes. Exercise 4.12(n) of [Mendelson] p. 235. See ~ uniinqs for a condition where equality holds. (Contributed by NM, 4-Dec-2003.) (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 29-Jun-2011.)
